title: U.S. extends temporary protected status for more than 330,000 immigrants
description: The Biden administration extended temporary protected status for more than 330,000 immigrants from El Salvador, Honduras, Nepal and Nicaragua.

title: ‘About 100’ dead in Nigeria after boat carrying wedding guests capsizes
description: The boat had been “suddenly overpowered by river waves and smashed against a tree,” according to a local daily.

title: Deaths on Middle East migration routes highest since 2017, UN finds
description: The number of deaths recorded in 2022 on Middle Eastern and North African migration routes amounts to more than half the total recorded number of deaths worldwide, according to newly released data from a United Nations agency.

title: Fighting intensifies in Ukraine; missile kills at least 11 in Kryvyi Rih
description: Ukrainian forces continued to press their counterattack in the Donetsk and Zaporizhzhia regions on Tuesday as Russia responded with airstrikes.

title: A hospital declared her dead. Then mourners heard sounds from her coffin.
description: Ecuadorean Bella Montoya was declared dead after a suspected stroke and cardiac arrest. But at her wake, "the coffin started to make sounds," her son said.

title: Helicopter ‘mishap’ in Syria injures 22 U.S. service members
description: The U.S. Central Command said 22 service members were injured Sunday in a helicopter incident in northeastern Syria. No cause was given, but "enemy fire" was not reported, it said.

title: U.K. woman sentenced to 28 months for late-term abortion
description: A pandemic program allowed patients to administer abortion drugs at home up until 10 weeks, but an exam concluded the woman was 32 to 34 weeks pregnant.

title: Three killed in Nottingham, England, amid van attack
description: Nottingham police said three people had been found dead in the street and a man had been arrested on suspicion of murder.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Deadly missile attack hits residential building in Zelensky’s hometown
description: A Russian attack on the city of Kryvyi Rih left civilians three dead and 25 injured, according to an official. Rescuers rushed to a smoldering multistory building.

title: Criticizing army is a crime in Russia — but not for mercenary boss Prigozhin
description: Yevgeniy Prigozhin, the Wagner mercenary group founder, often denounces Russia's military chiefs using expletives. Lately, he is touring Russia and making speeches like a politician.

title: Silvio Berlusconi’s political style lives on
description: Long after Silvio Berlusconi’s death, we’ll still be living with the brash political style and quasi-populism that powered the former Italian leader’s career.
